TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ColorTypeConverter extends System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverter

Docs.summary: Provides type converters for converting objects to and from objects of other types.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此类还具有用于编写方法<xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext>到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)]包和读取<xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext>从[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_metro](~/includes/tla2sharptla-metro-md.md)]给定的字符串，表示包[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]的<xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext>。
请参见基类<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverter>有关重要用法说明。
